name: MyTech Solutions
tagline: A worldwide travel technology innovation company
description:
MyTech Solutions is a worldwide travel innovation organization giving complete online travel Solutions for different Online travel groups. We create and deliver Travel Booking Engines, Travel White labels, Dynamic Sites, Mobile Applications Reservation system for Flights, Hotels, Cars, Bundles Tours, Train, Transport, Cruise and so on in B2B2C, B2B and B2C front end and numerous more administrations.
Recognised by Startupcity's magazine as One Of The Best 10 web development startup. We have worked with systems like Worldspan,Amadeus,Galileo,Travelport,Sabre,Multicom and TravelFusion. Our integration services are cost effective and ensure you get the best from the API providers system.
Mytech has proven track record of handling hotel,flight & car XML integration with various third party suppliers like Multicom, Expedia, Hotels.com, HotelBeds, Low Cost Beds, RoomsXML, Tourico, TransHotel, Travco, Triton and many more.
As a dynamic software development organization, our expertise lies in integration with wide range of third party party suppliers. We comprehend that we need to essentially upgrade your business to win our own. We endeavor to discover custom approach and construct enduring, commonly helpful associations with our customers.
Due to our knowledge of the travel domain and our process know-how, we can give effective and customized services.We use the latest technologies available for solving your booking integration requirements and make your application faster and more efficient. We have a dedicated research and development team that focuses on emerging technologies in the travel industry, and can help develop a reliable solution.
READ MORE...

locations.address: Block 23, Software Technology Parks of India, opp Garware Stadium, Chikhalthana MIDC
